title: Quant-UX

design-gpt.error-server: Something went wrong on the server
design-gpt.error-no-model: No model. Please reload the page
design-gpt.error-no-html: The server returned a wrong result
design-gpt.error-server-no-key: You need to enter the API key
design-gpt.error-insufficient_quota: Something is wrong with your OpenAI Quota. Check the payments.
design-gpt.error-yaml: OpenAI send wrong data. Please try again
design-gpt.gpt-model-gpt4-turbo: GPT4 - Creative: Takes longer, but might surprise you.
design-gpt.gpt-model: Select the GPT model to use
design-gpt.waiting-details: Generating the design... This takes around 60 seconds.
design-gpt.key-hint-1: We use OpenAI to power our AI engine.
design-gpt.key-hint-2: To use the service, you need to bring your API key.
design-gpt.key-hint-3: To get a key, create an account at
design-gpt.key-hint-5: Your API key is stored in your browser and not on our server.
design-gpt.welcome-design-msg: Hello, I am DesignGPT. I can create a design for you
design-gpt.prompt-placeholder: Descripe your page here, e.g. 'Create a login bad with red buttons...'
design-gpt.error-public: You need to sign up to use DesignGPT
design-gpt.robo-start-1: I am DesignGPT. Let's get started.
design-gpt.robo-waiting-1: Soon the design will be ready...
design-gpt.robo-waiting-2: I bet the design will be awesome!
design-gpt.robo-waiting-3: To get a different design, run the AI again!
design-gpt.robo-waiting-4: I can't wait to see what they will come up with!
design-gpt.robo-waiting-5: You know that you can ask for colors?
design-gpt.robo-waiting-10: The better you describe your design the better the output will be.
design-gpt.robo-waiting-11: Grab a snack while we crunch the numbers...
design-gpt.robo-waiting-12: I promise the results will be better than a chocolate fountain.
design-gpt.robo-waiting-13: Just a few more steps and we'll be done!
design-gpt.robo-waiting-14: I am going as fast as I can without breaking the space-time continuum
design-gpt.robo-waiting-15: Don't worry, it'll be worth the time!
design-gpt.robo-waiting-16: Making sure every pixel is perfectly aligned.
design-gpt.robo-waiting-17: Picking out the perfect color palette. Don't worry, I have excellent taste!
design-gpt.robo-waiting-19: Adding the finishing touches on your design...
design-gpt.robo-delayed-1: Hang in! It can take only some more seconds, minutes or hours...
design-gpt.robo-delayed-4: Sometimes the servers are really busy...
design-gpt.robo-delayed-5: Woah, your design must be really complex!
design-gpt.robo-delayed-8: Hang tight, your results are on the way.
design-gpt.robo-delayed-9: I apologize for the delay, the AI is taking a coffee break....
design-gpt.robo-delayed-10: I am not saying my system is powered by magic, but sometimes even magic needs a little time.
design-gpt.robo-delayed-11: The AI is currently doing some deep thinking...but it'll be worth waiting!
design-gpt.robo-delayed-13: Sometimes AI takes time, but it's worth it.
design-gpt.robo-delayed-14: The system is running a diagnostic scan to ensure that Skynet hasn't taken over.
design-gpt.robo-delayed-15: The AI get sometines lost in its deep neural network...
design-gpt.robo-delayed-16: I don't know what's going on here.
design-gpt.hint-1: You can include colors in your prompt! Ask for background, text or border colors. For example:
design-gpt.hint-1-prompt: Create a form with a red button. The text color should be black.
design-gpt.hint-2: You can ask to create forms and specify the different elements that should be included.
design-gpt.hint-2-prompt: Create a form with an email, password and age field.
design-gpt.hint-3: OpenAI can create data tables for you. No need to invent names, places, birthdays and so on
design-gpt.hint-3-prompt: Please create a table containing data of 5 persons. Include the name, age, weight and profession.
design-gpt.hint-4: You can influence the style of texts used in the design.
design-gpt.hint-4-prompt: Create a funny headline about designers.
design-gpt.hint-5: You can create DropDowns, Radio Groups and Checkbox Lists by including the options.
design-gpt.hint-5-prompt: Create a form where the users can choose their favorite music style. Examples are Rap, Soul, Metal and House.
design-gpt.hint-6-prompt: You know that you can ask for colors?
design-gpt.hint-7-prompt: You know that you can ask for colors?
design-gpt.hint-8-prompt: You know that you can ask for colors?
design-gpt.hint-9-prompt: You know that you can ask for colors?
design-gpt.hint-10-prompt: You know that you can ask for colors?
design-gpt.hint-11-prompt: You know that you can ask for colors?
design-gpt.hint-12-prompt: You know that you can ask for colors?

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.msg: You were invited for a usability test of the {{name}} app.
welcome.privacy: Your interactions, including clicks and text input, will be recorded to evaluate the app's performance and identify areas for improvement.
welcome.privacy1: We do not store any personal information about you, expect the data you choose to enter. You can find more information on our privacy page.
welcome.click-start: If you agree, click on the Start button to beginn the test.

password.title: Password
password.msg: To test this prototype you need a password. Please enter the password and press Next

tooltip.analyics-task: Show task completion, outliers and drop-offs
tooltip.analyics-screen: Show screen statstics such as scroll maps or dwell time

import.error-too-big: One file is too big. Max is 5MB
import.error-wrong-type: Only JPG, PNG and GIF are supported
import.error-figma-url: Copy the url of the Figma prototype
import.error-figma-load: Something went wrong loading the Figma file
import.error-figma-page: Select the page you want to import and click on 'Import'
import.error-public: Import does not work in Try-Out mode. Please sign up to import elements.
import.error-swagger-no-url: Please enter a URL with a swagger file

tos.error: You must accept the terms of service & privacy policy!

privacy.error: You must accept the privacy notice

intro.1: You were invited for a usability test of the
intro.tasks: You can try out the prototype and perform certain tasks. When you click on Show Tasks button, you will receive detailed instructions.
intro.no-tasks: You can try out the prototype by clicking on the Start Prototype button.

task.headline: Tasks
task.description: In the scope of this usability test you are kindly requested to perform the tasks listed below. Don't worry if you can not fulfill all tasks. This is just a sign that the prototype needs further improvements. The tasks are:
task.footer: You can try out the prototype by clicking on the Start Prototype button.
task.success-message: You have completed all tasks. You can close the page now.

qr.headline: Scan the QR code with your mobile device.

retire.msg: are you sure that you want to delete your account? You will loose all your data.
retire.cusoon: Thanks for using Quant-UX. We hope to see you soon again.

mail.error: Please enter your email and a message!

error.server-offline-msg: You have been gone for more than 30 minutes. To continue working, please log in again.

app.welcome-intro: Click on the 'Create' button to create your first prototype.

survey.no-data: No survey fields. Make sure that you have to marked the survey fields in the canvas.

applist.sign-in: Sign up to create a new Prototype

distribution.title: Data Distribution
distribution.play: To replay the session recording press
distribution.hint: Select a dot to replay the screen recording.

heatamp.hintAll: Find the busy areas in your design where the users have clicked most.
heatamp.hintFirst: Uncover which elements draw the most attention from the users right after a screen was loaded.
heatamp.hintFirstThree: Elements that are not clicked withing three interactions, may be hard to discover for the user.
heatamp.hintMissed: Clicks on passive elements, such as backgrounds, can indicate that the users made an error and could not understand the intended interaction.
heatamp.hintMouse: The mouse movement correlates strongly with the eye gaze. The mouse heatmap indicates areas that catch the users interest.

hint.scatter: Each dot presents a successful user test. Select them to get more information.
hint.session-msg: To replay the session recording press

perf.no-flow-msg: Please define a flow with two or more steps. Otherwise we cannot show details about the task performance.

testSettingsTaskAddHint: Click the  'Add Task' button to create a new task. The tasks a shown to the users before the test.
testSettingsShowSuccessInTest: Show message when all tasks are completed.
testSettingDesPlaceholder: Add a short description for the users in here
testSettingTaskDelete1: Do you want to delete the task '
testSettingsRecordOneTestPerUser: Record data only for the first time a user tests the prototype.
dashTaskEmpty: You can create tasks in the 'Test' tab.
taskRecorder1: A flow is the sequence of interactions the users have to perform to complete a task.
taskRecorder2: For instance, they have to visit 'Screen A' and navigate to 'Screen C'. You can also mark important sub events, like clicking on a button, or visitng a screen in between.
taskRecorderStep1: Perform the interactions your users should perform
taskRecorderStep2: You can press Pause to pause the recording
taskRecorderStep3: Press Done when the flow is complete.
taskRecorderStep4: Select all steps that are important for the task.
taskRecorderError1: You have not recorded any flow. Did you press the Record button?
taskRecorderDoNotAllow: Do not allow events in between.
videoTablePlanUpdateMsg: To see all videos upgate your plan.
